3D printed Plane
About

About

Me:

I’m a Maker, studied Aeronautical engineering & finished with M. Sc. @RWTH, am now working as a Research Associate researching machine tool metrology. Still, I have a passion for everything that flies and I want to put my 3D printer to good use, thus this project arose: DIY aerodynamic design, DIY CAD design, DIY build - see what I can do with the skills I acquired so far. Everyone needs some challenges and this challenge lets me take my mind of papers & proposals I have to write.

Special thanks to:

Tools used

FreeCAD: FreeCAD / FreeCAD

Ultimaker Cura: Ultimaker / Cura

XFLR5: XFLR5

Website

Minima Theme: jekyll / minima

Jekyll: jekyll / jekyll

3D printed Plane

I´ll describe my path to a mostly 3d-printed RC model airplane here. As logical, scientific, and well documented as possible. The regarding git with some more documentation, CAD-files, aerodynamic calculations, flight dynamics and 3d models can be found in the repository.
